entities.c: STANCE-Rolan: Met briefly at Haven arrival, accepted his greeting but prioritized staying with Rance over rest. Now fiercely protective of Rance, refuses separation even when exhausted.

Herald-basics (knowledge of roles, protocols, Gift types) flow naturally through bond without explicit teaching. Bond strengthens over time—thoughts/emotions become clearer as minds open to each other. Creates 'something greater than sum of parts.'

Stories of ritual sacrifice/blood magic/demon summoning are historical fact, not myth. 'Fires of Vkandis Sunlord' consumed many 'impure souls' over centuries. Officially banned in Karse for decades—current revival implies major policy shift.
Queen's Own Companion. Greeted Senta at Haven arrival, offered support and reassurance about Healers. Powerful mindvoice.
departed Waystation at Menmellith border after examining evidence
